mdrd_fun¶

Phenotyping.mdrd_fun(age, sex, race, race_correction: bool)¶

This Function applies MDRD GFR formula to return MDRD GFR value for different patients based on their age, sex, and race.

  1. Set GFR value to 75.

  2. If sex is “MALE”, set sex_coeff = 1. Else set sex_coeff = 0.742.

3. If race is “BLACK” or ‘African-American’, set race_coeff = 1.21. Else set race_coeff = 1. 3. Apply MDRD GFR formula and calculate MDRD GFR value. Formula shown as below:

mdrd = ((sex_coeff * race_coeff * 186 * float(age) ** (-0.203)) / gfr) ** (1/1.154)

Parameters

  • age (float) – age of the individual

  • sex (str) – gender of the individual

  • race (str) – race of the indidividual

  • race_correction (bool) – ADD DESC, True

Returns

Caluculated mdrd

Return type

float

Notes

eGFR_fun

Next topic

p00_generate_CKD_AKI
